Module eu.steffo.cleaver
Package eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows

Class FileSelectRow

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.Row
eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.FileSelectRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FileSelectRow
extends Row
A Row allowing for the selection of one or multiple files through a JFileChooser.
See Also:
CreateJobPanel, Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • selectionTextField

      protected final javax.swing.JTextField selectionTextField
      A non-editable text field that displays the files selected in the file choice dialog.

    • openFileChooserButton

      protected final javax.swing.JButton openFileChooserButton
      The button to open the file choice dialog.

    • fileChooser

      protected final javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser
      The JFileChooser that will be opened when the openFileChooserButton is pressed.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileSelectRow

      public FileSelectRow()
      Construct a FileSelectRow and set all properties of its elements.

  • Method Details

    • update

      protected void update()
      Update the text displayed in the selectionTextField with the current selected files. This method is called by the ActionListener of the openFileChooserButton after the file choice dialog is closed.

    • getSelectedFiles

      public java.io.File[] getSelectedFiles()
      Returns:
      The array of Files that were selected in the fileChooser.

    • clearSelectedFiles

      public void clearSelectedFiles()
      Clear the files selected in the fileChooser, and update the text displayed.

    • setFileFilter

      public void setFileFilter​(javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter)
      Set a specific FileFilter in the fileChooser. Used by the StitchPanel to restrict the selection to only *.chp files.
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter to set.
